Description.Text:
Property Location
Located in Moscow (Arbat), Golden Ring Hotel is minutes from Ministry of Foreign Affairs and Pushkin House Museum on Arbat. This 5-star hotel is close to Moscow Kremlin and Red Square.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 293 air-conditioned rooms featuring minibars. Complimentary wired and wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and satellite programming provides entertainment. Bathrooms feature shower/tub combinations, designer toiletries, and complimentary toiletries. Conveniences include phones, as well as safes and desks.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Be sure to enjoy recreational amenities, including a health club, a spa tub, and a sauna. This hotel also features complimentary wireless Internet access, concierge services, and gift shops/newsstands.

Dining
Satisfy your appetite at the hotel's restaurant, which serves dinner and brunch, or stay in and take advantage of 24-hour room service. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include a business center, limo/town car service, and complimentary newspapers in the lobby. Planning an event in Moscow? This hotel has 6458 square feet (600 square meters) of space consisting of conference space and meeting rooms. A roundtrip airport shuttle is available for a surcharge.


Pets not allowed Check-in time starts at 2 PM Check-out time is noon
Satisfy your appetite at the hotel's restaurant, which serves dinner and brunch, or stay in and take advantage of 24-hour room service. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
  • No onsite parking is available.

Located in Moscow (Arbat), Golden Ring Hotel is minutes from Ministry of Foreign Affairs and Pushkin House Museum on Arbat. This 5-star hotel is close to Moscow Kremlin and Red Square.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Ministry of Foreign Affairs - 0.2 km / 0.1 mi
Pushkin House Museum on Arbat - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
Vakhtangova Theatre - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi
Scriabin Memorial Museum - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi
Russian White House - 1 km / 0.6 mi
Embassy of the United States of America - 1.1 km / 0.7 mi
NB Gallery - 1.1 km / 0.7 mi
Old Arbat - 1.2 km / 0.7 mi
Chaliapin House Museum - 1.2 km / 0.7 mi
Multimedia Art Museum - 1.2 km / 0.8 mi
Moscow House of Photography - 1.2 km / 0.8 mi
Tolstoy Estate - 1.3 km / 0.8 mi
Museum of History of Moscow - 1.3 km / 0.8 mi
Cathedral of Christ the Savior - 1.5 km / 0.9 mi
Nikolay Roerich Museum - 1.5 km / 0.9 mi

The preferred airport for Golden Ring Hotel is Moscow (SVO-Sheremetyevo) - 26.7 km / 16.6 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

The preferred airport for Golden Ring Hotel is Moscow (SVO-Sheremetyevo) - 26.8 km / 16.6 mi.
